definition: to have a few drinks/to drink to one's heart's content

sentences.english: some drink from the fountain of knowledge, but he just gargled.
sentences.chinese: 人家畅饮智慧之泉，他只是拿来漱口了。

sentences.english: Seeds are open - minded, drink a heaven-sent "holy water."
sentences.chinese: 种子们放开胸怀，畅饮着天赐的“圣水”。

sentences.english: To engage in boisterous, drunken merrymaking.
sentences.chinese: 参加喧哗的畅饮的寻欢作乐。

sentences.english: He likes to drink, have a good time, and tell everyone how wonderful he is.
sentences.chinese: 他开怀畅饮，欢度每一刻，告诉每个人他有多棒。

sentences.english: I patiently filled him in on the British tradition of sherry tippling .
sentences.chinese: 我耐心细致地给他讲述了英国人畅饮雪利酒的传统。

sentences.english: Passes to spectator stand and beer coupons are offered to bona-fide visitors only.
sentences.chinese: 观赏区入场券及啤酒畅饮券只供访港旅客使用。

sentences.english: Yours will be the ineffable joy of quaffing the cup of martyrdom for His sake.
sentences.chinese: 你得到的将是畅饮为祂殉道的莫名欢乐之杯。

sentences.english: Unbridled drink it and enjoy, enjoy the ease of food.
sentences.chinese: 肆无忌惮的开怀畅饮，轻松自如的享受美食。

sentences.english: The streams on earth I've tasted, More deep I'll drink above;
sentences.chinese: 既浅尝此泉于地，定必畅饮于天。

sentences.english: And Cleopatra Night drinks all. 'Tis done.
sentences.chinese: 黑夜埃及女皇举杯畅饮。

sentences.english: French like drinking after they sing the Christmas song.
sentences.chinese: 法国人会唱完圣诞歌后开怀畅饮。

sentences.english: Some drink from the fountain of knowledge, but he just gargled. 7.
sentences.chinese: 人家畅饮智慧之泉，他只是拿来漱了漱口。

sentences.english: They drank deep of the fresh spring water.
People sang and danced and drank.
sentences.chinese: 人们唱歌跳舞，举杯畅饮。

sentences.english: It was the sailors' first night shore; they painted the town red.
sentences.chinese: 那是水手们上岸的第一个晚上，他们开怀畅饮起来。

sentences.english: Do you still remember that we drank our fill on our parting dinner ?
sentences.chinese: 还记得分别宴会上我们的举杯畅饮吗？

definition: to get thoroughly drunk (idiom)/to get plastered
to not go home until drunk (idiom)/let's make a night of it!
to toast sb (with wine etc)/to drink a toast
to enjoy oneself to the full/to one's heart's content
